title: Championship Ashe Border and Icon
body: If I get the Championship Ashe Border and Icon set from the loot  am I getting the Championship skin also or just the border and icon ?

replies.body: You'll just get the border or icon.  You'll still need to snag the skin to use those.

I think for clarity reasons it should say "or" instead of "and" because how the reward item is written now  (Championship Ashe Border and Icon) indicates that you get the border and the icon.  I personally would be pretty upset if i had spent the points for both and ended up with just one.
welp, there goes all my hopes and dreams {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
